A, B, C = map(int, input().split())

print(C - (A - B) if A - B < C else 0)

A, B, C = map(int, input().split())

print(C-(A-B))

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))

# Main
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

# If Bottle 2 can't hold Bottle 1's content, transfer all the water
if a < b:
    print(c - (b - a))
else:
    print(c)
